turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to place an order coffee from Peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order an espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it and which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on West North Avenue in Chicago.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me send your order to that location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a triple espresso to be picked up at the peet's on west north avenue in chicago, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
